item.title: Testing Internal Network Speed via iperf3
item.description: Recently, I replaced my switch and to test the speed of the internal network, I found this tool - iperf3 It is a testing program that supports Windows, Linux, and macOS and is mainly operated through commands. I often use it to test the speed between two different servers in different locations. So, here’s how to install it: First, go to the iperf3 official website and find the corresponding system (choose Windows for Windows, macOS for macOS, and Linux for Linux).
